decision_conditions:
The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved drawings and documents:
19168_PL_200; Detail Drawings 1 South Elevation Bay Study
19168_P_201; Detail Drawings 2 Typical Bay Study – West Elevation
19168_PL_202; Detail Drawings 3 West Elevation Bay Study
19168_PL_203; Detail Drawings 4 South Elevation Bay Study
19168_PL_204; Detail Drawings 4 Residential Entrance – Block B
19168_PL_205; Detail Drawing 6 Residnetial Entrance – Block A2
19168_PL_206; Detail Drawing 7 Residential Entrance – Block A1
19168_PL_207; Detail Drawing 8 Balconies – Inset
19168_PL_208; Detail Drawing 9 Balconies – Corner & Splays
19168_PL_209; Detail Drawing 10 Balconies – Solid
19168_PL_210; Detail Drawing 11 Balconies – Combined 
19168_PL_211; Detail Drawing 12 Balconies – Bolt On
19168_PL_212; Detail Drawing 13 East Elevation Lower Floors
19168_PL_213; Detail Drawing 14 Car Park Entrance
19168_PL_214; Condition 5 – Exeternal Plant Roof Sections
SDA 3110/SK135 (Revision B); Roof Plan Service Terminations

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
description: Details pursuant to condition 3 (detailed drawings) and condition 5 (external equipment) of planning permission 18/02010/FULOPDC dated 23/07/2019 for erection of two buildings between six, ten, twelve and fourteen storeys (min c. 20.1m and max. c. 46.1m above ground level) comprising 105 residential units and 280sqm of commercial floorspace (Use classes A1/A2/A3/A4/B1/D1/D2), public open space, accessible parking, cycle storage, landscaping and related ancillary works.
site_name: Land East of Victoria Care Centre
